title: Lorenz Curve shows distribution of personal income

content.question: A Lorenz curve can be used by economists to do which of the following?

choices.label: Show the distribution of personal income
Show the amount of wealth in a nation
Show the amount of consumption in a nation
Explain why different households have different incomes
Explain why income is equally distributed in socialist countries

content.answer: Show the distribution of personal income
